project_plan.name: Word Frequency Counter in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that reads a text file and counts the frequency of each word, then displays the top 10 most common words in the terminal.

task.name: Read content from a specified text file and store it in memory
Count the frequency of each word in the text
Sort the words based on their frequency
Display the top 10 most common words in the terminal
Write tests for each of the functions implemented above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
